div.div:
Generic config that applies to all devices
- WiFi credentials & fallback AP
- API, OTA & Logger

switch.text: Generic config that applies to all devices...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 133px; margin-left: 182px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Shared config for a certain device
- Eg: Shelly 1, Sonoff Mini, ...
- GPIO Pins, sensors, relays, status lights

switch.text: Shared config for a certain device...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 232px; margin-left: 182px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Actual config for a specific devices
- Only contains a name
- Imports the other configuration files

switch.text: Actual config for a specific devices...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
